actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Select Committee on Small Business (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-22.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Select Committee on Small Business for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-22) Authorizes additional expenditures, not to exceed $326,900, from March 1, 1979, through February 29, 1980, by the Senate Select Committee on Small Business for inquiries and investigations. Directs the Select committee to report its findings and recommendations to the Senate not later than February 29, 1980.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Select Committee on Small Business for inquiries and investigations.
